channel.title: Scilla Language Server
channel.description: Recent content on Scilla Language Server

item.title: Hello Community
item.description: The journey begins As Zilliqa is going live soon, I decided to brush up the build scripts and the repository structure to allow anyone to participate in the development of the language server for the Scilla programming language which is the language in which Zilliqa smart contracts are deployed. You can find the repository and the build instructions in the Github repsitory You can download the latest build for inclusion as a plugin here
